question: What is ZapShift?
answer: ZapShift is a comprehensive parcel delivery and management system that connects merchants, delivery agents, and warehouses for seamless parcel tracking and delivery across 64 districts nationwide.

question: How do I book a parcel for delivery?
answer: As a merchant, simply log in to your account, provide parcel details (weight, type, destination), select your delivery option, and proceed with payment. You'll receive a tracking ID immediately.

question: What are your delivery charges?
answer: Documents cost ৳60 (within city) or ৳80 (outside city). Non-documents up to 3kg are ৳110 (within city) or ৳150 (outside city). Additional charges apply for parcels over 3kg at ৳40/kg.

question: How can I track my parcel?
answer: You can track your parcel in real-time using the tracking ID provided at booking. Log in to your account to view the current status, location, and estimated delivery time.

question: What areas do you deliver to?
answer: ZapShift provides delivery services across all 64 districts nationwide. Whether it's within the city or outside, we have nationwide coverage to ensure your parcels reach their destination.

question: How is delivery security ensured?
answer: We use OTP-based secure delivery confirmation. Both the sender and receiver must verify with OTP during the delivery process to ensure secure and authentic delivery.

question: Can I become a delivery agent?
answer: Yes! Delivery agents earn ৳20 per delivery. Register as an agent to start accepting delivery jobs. Your responsibilities include collecting, updating status, and delivering parcels to customers.

question: What happens if my parcel goes outside the city?
answer: Parcels going outside the city are sent to our warehouse network. Our warehouse team then coordinates with destination-area agents to ensure timely delivery to your specified location.

question: Do you provide refunds for failed deliveries?
answer: If a delivery fails, please contact our support team immediately with your tracking ID. We'll investigate and provide appropriate resolution, which may include a refund or redelivery.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: Our customer support team is available through the ZapShift platform. You can submit inquiries through your account dashboard, and our team will respond promptly to resolve any issues.
